data.message: Facebook is the CIA FBI etc  best book on who's who and what's what!! So when you people put all your business here think twice!!!

replies.message: You shout from a distant tower to the kingdom of the deaf, my friend. These "kids" are living in a world of their own.. Own insecurities, must have complete and total strangers as friends (how else would they prove they be popular, need 2347 "friends"). Reckless self promotion..."nah my future employer would never look at my FB page" and continue to post pics and content that would make a merchant marine blush. And suffer greatly from separation anxiety, have to check FB every two seconds to see if the Noble Prize Committee has nominated them for their latest (peppered with obscenities, stupidity and grammatical errors) post. All along failing to realize this is a PUBLIC forum and Big Brother is absolutely   monitoring. Eh people get the government they deserve.
